body: @4ad, which GCC intrinsics do they match? I'm wondering because they specifically have to be sequentially consistent to match the x86 atomics, and it's really easy to be less than sequentially consistent on ARM. Unfortunately, I don't know the semantics of the ARM instructions well enough to be sure, but I don't see any DMBs in the arm64 code, and my understanding is that STLR is only store-release, not sequentially consistent.
